mapper.select: select bno , bookName , author , publishing ,plot ,bi.images ,regDate ,updateDate , min(ord) from tbl_book tb left outer join tbl_book_image bi on tb.bno = bi.image_bno where bno > 0 group by bno , bookName , author , publishing ,plot ,regDate ,updateDate, bi.images order by bno desc limit #{skip}, #{size}
